OOC: There are some non-regular weapons, but he's a NPC.

BIC

As he sees the Predacons answer his challenge, Rockseeker slowly 
starts to laugh. His is a maniacal laugh that he's not used to make.

Rockseeker: So, the parasites have come out to play, heh? (He's 
clearly Canadian!) Let's oblige them.

Shots are fired and he ceases firing his dual pulse gun in order to 
create a force wall that absorbed the hits.

Rockseeker: Who dares to defy me?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "LOOK OUT where your're shooting!!!! or all will Blow up!!!"roared 
> Hydras

> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > ooc: dunno where both tankor and sharpclaws are, so i'll make 
> > something up - as is the nature of the beast =)
> > 
> > ::SharpClaws::
> > 
> > SharpClaws jumps up as the Predacons base is rocked by heavy 
> blasts. 
> > His comm crackles as Hydras' voice roars at him and Tankor to 
> > terminate the enemy. SharpClaws glances over at Tankor, "C'mon 
> > Tanks' lets lay into whatever's out there."
> > 
> > "Beast mode." he says as he quickly transforms and rushes to the 
> > bases exit. Getting outside, he spots the sturdy looking robot 
> > standing not far from the base with a nasty looking gun in his 
> hands.
> > 
> > "Hey hey! Watch where you're shooting that thing!" he says as a 
> shot 
> > rocks the shields, "Oh boy, that's it." A laser rifle pops out of 
> > SharpClaws' left arm, and attaches itself there. A blast shield 
> > folds out on his right arm, and the bot leaves the forcefield, 
> > firing 3 blasts in quick succession at Rockseeker.
> >

> > 
> > Alarms ran inside Predacon's base, Hydras roared angerend and

are
